Work worth talking about

Various identities, campaigns, and events.

This collection of projects showcases a variety of industries, styles, and mediums. All of them have stories, and I’d be happy to talk more about them if you have questions. Enjoy!

Credits and collaborators:

I was the primary designer and art director in these projects with the exception of the BBQ map. This was designed by Lib Ramos – I illustrated the map and wrote the content. It (shameless plug) can be purchased here.
